statement.sql: select MSISDN, DA_ID from PartnerDetails where Service_User =? and Service_Password = MD5(?)
SELECT ROUND(TransactionUser.IPD_NETTRANSFER*?,0), TRANSACTION_POSTFIX, MIN_LIMIT, MAX_LIMIT, POSTPAID_MIN_LIMIT, POSTPAID_MAX_LIMIT from TransactionUser where USER_ID=?
